title: Damnit Deficio
body:
Announces TSM but because he has his "They're Danish" trademark, he fails to announce Dyrus.

Screw this Danish caster, keep him off the desk. 

Also, he keeps talking over Monte! >.<

replies.body:
What u talking about Deficio is epix :)


BTW Strike 2 to me by RIOTcons... looks me thread wasn't up to their standards LoL.  Cannot deny my logic of it though.

RIOT just has no sense of humor whatsoever...
